sentences.english: There's a fine line between boastful and confident.
sentences.chinese: 自誇和自信之間有微妙的區別。

sentences.english: If I must boast, I will boast of the things that show my weakness.
sentences.chinese: 我若必須自誇，就誇那關乎我軟弱的事便了。

sentences.english: There was no use asking him to give any suggestion. he would always brag that there was nothing like leather.
sentences.chinese: 用不着讓他提什麼建議，他總好王婆賣瓜，自賣自誇。

sentences.english: They succeeded,but they didn't boast it.
sentences.chinese: 他們成功了，可他們沒有以此自誇。

sentences.english: God is ashamed when the prosperous boasts of his special favor.
sentences.chinese: 繁榮者自誇其受神的特別榮寵，神也感到羞愧。

sentences.english: They boasted that they could beat that new team, but they lost and had to eat crow.
sentences.chinese: 他們自誇能擊敗那支新隊，但是他們輸了，只好認錯。

sentences.english: If I must needs glory, I will glory of the things which concern mine infirmities.
sentences.chinese: 我若必須自誇，就誇那關乎我軟弱的事便了。

sentences.english: And while that sounds a bit boastful, it's a pretty accurate representation.
sentences.chinese: 雖然這聽起來有點自誇，這是一個相當準確的代表性。

sentences.english: If I must boast, I will boast of the things that concern myweakness.
sentences.chinese: 我若必須自誇，就誇那關乎我軟弱的事便了。

sentences.english: A boaster and a liar are all one.
sentences.chinese: 自誇的人和說謊的人都是同一類人。

sentences.english: Taking dangerous weeks for beauty, can not boast, its thick DE yi.
sentences.chinese: 扶危周急固爲美事，能不自誇，則其厚德矣。

sentences.english: You certainly wouldn't brag to your friends how awesome you are malnourishing yourself.
sentences.chinese: 我想你肯定不會因爲自己營養不良而向朋友自誇吧？

sentences.english: I have not participated in any races and I can't boast that I run for several hours every day.
sentences.chinese: 我從沒參加過任何比賽，也不敢自誇每天都跑幾小時。

sentences.english: Seeing that many glory after the flesh, I will glory also.
sentences.chinese: 既有好些人憑着血氣自誇，我也要自誇了。
